name: Tab Age Tracker
description: Tracks and analyzes the age of your open tabs to help you reduce clutter and reach Tab Zero
changes: Fixed Content Security Policy to remove both 'unsafe-eval' and 'unsafe-inline' directives for full compliance with Chrome's security requirements
Modified CSP to use only 'self' sources for scripts and styles
Updated all JavaScript to avoid inline event handlers and evaluated code
Improved security posture of the extension while maintaining full functionality
